title: Where Iran has retaliated across the Middle East, according to satellite images and videos
summary_full: Iran intensified its strikes against countries in the Persian Gulf and Israel on Sunday, attacking at least nine countries since the start of the joint U.S.-Israeli attack.
summary_public: Iran intensified its strikes against countries in the Persian Gulf and Israel on Sunday, attacking at least nine countries since the start of the joint U.S.-Israeli attack.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: intensified its strikes against countries in the Persian Gulf and Israel

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Iran intensified its strikes against countries in the Persian Gulf
